name: Personalised Notebook

reviews.review: beautiful notebook as well as very high quality, i would definitely recommend buying one!
The book is from the cover so it feels like leather so really a very pleasant material. Simply the madness it is also stable and also not too big or too small exactly perfect

description:
A personalised Birth Flower Notebook.

A notebook personalised with your own words and the birth flower of your choice.

We have 12 different flowers for each month of the year, and we add in a bit of detail as to the traits that are associated with those months and flowers.

name: Anniversary Gift for Him
description: This soft cover journal is a great reminder to never forget how wildly capable you are.

name: Soft Cover Journal

reviews.review: Looks just like the description! Great quality item!
Beautiful journals! Just the right size.

description:
No rain no flowers spiral notebook - so cute and so inspirational.

Designed, manufactured, and printed in the USA.

This handmade, one-of-a-kind journal is perfect for note taking on the go, or just to jot down thoughts throughout the day.

Size:
5.5 x 8.5 inches

Details:
- Spiral bound, double silver wire
- 100 sheets/50 double sided individual pages
- college ruled
- matte laminated soft cover
- front cover print only

name: Spiral Notebooks

reviews.review: SO cute, great quality notebook, arrived super fast
Sent these notebooks to my women's network mentees and they loved them! This is a great gift for anyone who needs a little daily inspiration!
This notebook is thicker than expected! I bought this for a teacher friend, and I know she is going to love it. I want one for myself!

description:
This soft cover journal is a great reminder to never forget how wildly capable you are.

These spiral notebooks are great for on-the-go note-taking, journaling, making lists, + more.

Designed, manufactured, and printed in the USA.

Size:
5.5 x 8.5 inches

Notebook Details:
- Spiral-bound, double silver wire
- 200 sheets/100 double-sided individual pages
- college ruled
- matte laminated soft cover
- front cover print only
- solid color back cover
